CustomField.description: Users populate this input with any additional one-time wealth, insurance, or other relevant income in the deal not captured in other loan, deposit, or treasury inputs. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to capture any additional one-time wealth, insurance, or other relevant income in the deal an FI originates outside of nCino and not captured in existing loan, deposit, or treasury inputs.
CustomField.label: Additional One Time Income
